# f5distributedcloud_endpoint (Resource)

Manages an F5 Distributed Cloud Endpoint. Endpoints define service destinations.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the Endpoint.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the Endpoint is created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the Endpoint.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the Endpoint.
